name: UnregisterMerchantRequest
desc: The request body you use to unregister one or more merchant domains.

items.name: domainNames
items.desc: A list of fully qualified domain names to unregister. If a merchant has no remaining domain names after this request removes domains, Apple Pay server deletes the merchantâ€™s registration.

items.name: partnerInternalMerchantIdentifier
items.desc: A merchant identifier that you create to uniquely identify the registered merchant, and which you use in Apple Pay transactions and in this API.

items.name: reason
items.desc: A short, human-readable phrase that describes the cause of unregistration.
